member.name: D3D12_PREDICATION_OP
member.summary: Specifies the predication operation to apply.

member.name: D3D12_PREDICATION_OP.D3D12_PREDICATION_OP_EQUAL_ZERO
member.summary: Enables predication if all 64-bits are zero.

member.name: D3D12_PREDICATION_OP.D3D12_PREDICATION_OP_NOT_EQUAL_ZERO
member.summary: Enables predication if at least one of the 64-bits are not zero.
